(6, 6, 1): 1920-22: Chairman, Workers' and Peasants' Inspectorate of the Russian SFSR
(6, 7, 1): 1917-22: People's Commissar, Nationalities of the Russian SFSR
(6, 10, 1): a  Despite abolishing the office of General Secretary in 1952, Stalin continued to exercise its powers as the Secretariat's highest-ranking member.
(6, 11, 1): b  After Stalin's death, Malenkov temporarily emerged as the highest-ranking member of the Secretariat.
